channel.title: Radio Republik
channel.description: Heya everyone. Awhile back i posted some stuff about my brother in law and his rapping. Well on Sunday hes signed to preform for Sean Kingston. If he likes them they might get sponsored! So just a message to everybody. If you ever hear of Radio Republik on much music or on the radio, Remember, Marc Elliot, a k a Quee, is my brother in-law.

item.title: Radio Republik
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“im hard, post:14, topic:354190”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=450478.msg3304306#msg3304306 date=1281553771]
Feel special? I’m related to famous people as well, its really nothing to feel special about, as if you trace you relatives, you are bound to be related.
[/quote]

Justin Beiber is my brother, I’m gonna go die now. Bye :)[/quote]

Rofl. Dont worry, your mom is FINE if justin bieber is your brother. [His name doesnt deserve caps]

Read full topic

item.title: Radio Republik
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:11, topic:354190”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=450478.msg3304474#msg3304474 date=1281560380]

Everyone is related somehow.

In the long-run yes, but very faintly.
[/quote]
So then I guess there is no need for racism. Everyone is a white, asian, nigger, rest of the world.[/quote]

Almost everyone is related because there was a bottleneck.

http://en.wikipedia.org/Population_bottleneck

Read full topic
